summary.name: r-robustrankaggreg
summary.description: Methods for aggregating ranked lists, especially lists of genes. It implementsthe Robust Rank Aggregation (Kolde et. al in preparation) and some other simplealgorithms for the task. RRA method uses a probabilistic model for aggregationthat is robust to noise and also facilitates the calculation of significanceprobabilities for all the elements in the final ranking.
